clusterList.phrase: i know that i'm endangering my life and am even liable to lose my father but i hope that he'll understand this and that god will give him and my family patience and willingness to open their eyes to jesus and to christianity maybe one day i'll be able to return to palestine and to ramallah with jesus in the kingdom of god
i hope my father and family open their eyes to jesus and the kingdom of god
i will be exceedingly happy if the holy father decides to accept our invitation to visit syria in this year
god will help you overflow with hope in him through the holy spirit's power within you
as surely as the lord the god of israel lives-the god i serve-there will be no dew or rain during the next few years until i give the word
people with an open mind i mainly miss my mother my brothers and sisters but i know that it will be very difficult for me to return to ramallah soon
today i believe i am immigrating to god and his prophet

for if you return to the lord your relatives and your children will be treated mercifully by their captors and they will be able to return to this land for the lord your god is gracious and merciful if you return to him he will not continue to turn his face from you
for i know the plans i have for you declares the lord plans to prosper you and not to harm you plans to give you a hope and a future jeremiah 29 11
who knows what will happen between now and then only god knows his plans for us
